metadata.title: CVE-2020-14424 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Cacti before 1.2.18 allows remote attackers to trigger XSS via templateimport for the midwinter theme.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14424` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
